SUB_W08_WRLD_MIDO_START_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_WRLD_MIDO_START_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, this is weird as all get-out.
Am I really gonna find spirits down here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Hm? Got something at my feet here...

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Cripes! That is one huge worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Stay away from that worm, you!
It's mine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Aw, heck!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't recognize you, stranger.
Where are you from?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Where I'm from, fella, it's real rude
to pop outta the ground and scare
somebody half to death.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't care if it's rude.
I want the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
All yours, guy; I got no use
for some huge creepy-crawly.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You sure? I mean, really sure? Worm this big is a pretty rare find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Sure as shoot, guy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yesss! Now I can finally go home!
You're good people, stranger. Take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hold on just one second there, bud!
I actually came here lookin' for spirits.
Know anything that might fit the bill?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Nope—but good luck all the same.
Bye now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Wait!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: What is it this time?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
See, I'm not much for this whole
'underground' deal, so I was wondering
how a fella...you know? Gets around?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait. You can't dig holes?
How have you LIVED, man!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I'm not from here,
like I said.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yeesh, I can't follow a word you say.
Fine, I'll take you to my house—
but then you're on your own. Capisce?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Capisce, bud. Oh, and I'm Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I'm Tope, of the Kuld.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Holy heck, fella! You dug that hole
there in no time flat.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
The trick is to look for spots
where the earth is soft.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Hey, but if you go around diggin'
all the time, doesn't the entire
place just get riddled with holes?

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nope. Our tunnels eventually cave in
and fill up all on their own.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sounds like more trouble
than it's worth.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
That's 'cause you gotta look
at the big picture! See, when the earth gets dug up and filled in,
it makes the soil more fertile. That fertile
soil goes on to nurture nutrient-rich worms,
which all of us then chow down on.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh. That's a well-balanced cycle,
all right.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I dunno about that.
All I know is that we couldn't get
by if we didn't do it this way.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Crummy thing is that worms have been real
hard to come by lately—but that's a tale
for another time. Now let's go home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Here's the colony where
we Kuld live.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: So this is where your pals are?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Dunno if I'd call 'em that; Kuld typically work alone, and we never form groups. We only meet up like this because it's a convenient way to keep everybody safe.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, let's go to my house.
It's over there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Coste! I'm home!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Late again, Tope! Ground below, how long
does it take to catch one measly worm!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! I'm hungry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: I know, honey. I know.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
See that? Your poor son is starving!
Now hand over the worms already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Here you go, honeybunch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you KIDDING me!? This is it?
Well, that's just pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Sorry, sweetie, but you know how poor
the hunting's been lately, and—

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear your excuses!
How pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
So not to butt in or anything, but how come
you've got a wife and kid if you Kuld folks
all work alone?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: We work alone. That doesn't mean we don't have families.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, a guest! Well, this is unusual.
Why didn't you tell me you were bringing
someone home, you grubhead!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Honey, this is Tsunanori.
He's the one who gave me the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Tsunanori, this is my wife, Coste,
and my son, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Hey there, folks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry you had to see such a disgraceful
display, stranger. We don't have much,
but please make yourself at home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: And as for you, Tope...

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Yes, sweetlips?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You're an idiot if you think this single
worm is enough for us! Little Gourmand
here is a growing pup, you know!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! When's fooooood!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Of course, honey. I'll be right back.
Just hold on, all right, Son?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You said something about worms being
hard to come by lately, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, it's like their population dried
up all of a sudden. And it's not just
worms—other creatures too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Any idea why?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope, but I'm looking into it—because if
this continues, we're all gonna starve.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
So why not tell your wife all that so she
knows why you're always runnin' late?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
The last thing I want to do is cause
Coste any unnecessary worry.
Nope, this is something where I just
have to carry my own water.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Back to investigating for me, then!
But, uh, what're you gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Figured I'd tag along and see if I could help.
I mean, heck, it's not like I'm gonna find
any spirits without you, anyway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, today I'm goin' farther than usual,
so we might end up runnin' into other species.
Sure you're ready for that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
So there's other people livin' down
here besides you mole folks?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
A few, yeah—though we don't usually
interact, so I can't tell you much more. This world's got a kind of code, see:
stick to your own, avoid unnecessary spats,
and you'll generally be golden.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
One of the Bashar might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey! Get outta here, you!
This is Kuld territory!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Stop yelling, you silly mole!
What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, Coste! What a relief!
Where were you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
We both got bored waiting for you
to come home, so we took a little
walk to kill some time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry, honeypants, but it's not safe out
here right now. In fact, you should just stay
away from the colony altogether for a bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Don't need to tell me twice—just make
sure you come home with some good
worms this time. You hear me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes, thanks to you. Also, you're one
of the Kuld that live here, right?
Tope, I think?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
That's me, all right. But tell me,
have you seen a mole named Coste?
She's my wife.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Sure did! Said she was worried
and headed out to try and find you.
A real firecracker, that one!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, at least she's not here.
That's a relief.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Know anything about that Bashar
fella that attacked you, maybe?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Nope. All I know is they came
after me outta nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: One of the Naml might be at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
Know anything about that Naml
who attacked you there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
Now stop asking questions,
'cause we're going after that Naml!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text:
One of the Dufda might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You're not making this easy!
Whatever. Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
Know anything about that Dufda
who attacked you there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
Now stop asking questions,
'cause we're going after that Dufda!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
This is the last colony, so I bet the
Lord of the Earth is gonna show.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: This is my house, and I will protect it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
The ground is shaking...
It's coming!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: It's not moving... Is it over?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Yep, that thing's busted, all right—but while
we saved the world from immediate danger,
I couldn't stop all the ground pollution.
Sorry as heck about that, guy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
No, it's better this way; I actually hate the
thought of relying on something called
the 'Lord of the Earth' to survive.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
By the way, didja ever find those
spirits you were lookin' for?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Sure did, bud. I took care of business when
we dealt with the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Well, I'm glad it all worked out for you.
As for us, I feel confident we'll take back our
wormy world without the help of some 'Lord.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Tope! Where in the WORLD
have you been!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Gourmand? I'm gonna do it.
I'M GONNA DOOOOOO IT!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh for the love of dirt... Maybe stop all
this fool yelling and go get us some worms,
you good-for-nothing mole!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ERRORS REPAIRED. RESTARTING.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Is this thing comin' at us again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. SOIL CONTAMINATION DETECTED. INITIATING CLEANUP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Huh? It left.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We did it, Tope! The Lord of the Earth
is starting to clean up the soil!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Then we did it?
We saved the world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Sure looks that way. Once I went ahead
and extracted the spirit power from it,
it stopped acting all funny.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Which means everything went
exactly as it should've.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
And it's all because of you, bud.
Can't thank you enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! Of course it is! ...Although I
suppose you pulled your weight too.
So thanks for everything, and take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Coste! Gourmand! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm bored of worms, Mommy!
I wanna eat something TASTY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
...And that's why I need you to
take my son with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
All children need to leave the burrow
sometime, and I know you'll take very
good care of our little Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yaaay! I can't wait to eat
all of the tasties!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
This ain't gonna be some fancy
restaurant tour there, bud! Still, I suppose I can't say no
since Tope's askin' so nicely...

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We'll rest easy knowing our son
is with you, Tsunanori. Now don't make any trouble, Son.
You do everything he says, all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Have fun, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Yaaaaaay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
So was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I mean, it could have just been one of the
carnivorous mushrooms the Naml use, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
Got me, fella. Heck, I don't think
there's even a way to tell if it's
cleaning up the earth or not.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning it up, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about being eaten alive by some gigantic mushroom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Can't say. Heck, the Naml used it even
knowing the kind of danger it posed.
They didn't try to free the Lord of
the Earth until the very last second.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Maybe the Naml were just waiting for a mighty
stranger like you to show up—but considering
you couldn't even dig through the earth without
my help, I think some gratitude is in order?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text: You know it, bud. Heck, my meeting you got me some spirit power and let me clean up this world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Heh. You sure did, fella.
Take care, okay?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
This has to be some bad Dufda
joke that went a little too far.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
Guess we'll never know if that was really
the Lord of the Earth or if it actually
purified the soil.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning up the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about that thing swallowing me whole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Still, I doubt it mattered much to the
Lord of the Earth if there were colonies
around or not, so long as the thing was
chowing down on dirt and cleaning it up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Yeah, I suppose it might've actually
been the Lord of the Earth... You know what? I'm gonna say it was.
Heck, it renewed our soil, after all!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the origin of that
big quake earlier.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.text: UNABLE TO BOOT NORMALLY. SWITCHING TO START/STOP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Well, I'll be danged...
The Lord of the Earth is actually
some kind of dirt-purifying machine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.text: ERROR. ERROR. ERROR. UNABLE TO EXECUTE START/STOP PROCESS. NORMAL OPERATIONS NOT GUARANTEED.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.text: TERRAFORMING PROCESS DEEMED A FAILURE. BEGINNING RESET OF WORLD ENVIRONMENT. ALERT. ALERT. THIS PROCESS IS DANGEROUS. OPERATORS MUST TAKE SHELTER IMMEDIATELY.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.text:
Well, heck. This thing's gone
all kinds of haywire.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.text:
If we don't stop the Lord of the Earth,
it's gonna destroy the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.text:
Probably some colony—thing seems pretty
fired up about wiping out all life here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.text: Wait, so this is the Lord of the Earth!? Heck, that's no lord—it's just a dang bug! How's that supposed to rejuvenate the earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
There's something off about these bugs.
Their eyes are...dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
You think? I mean, 'cause I figure they're
moving around okay. Plus they've been in
the earth all this time, so that could
just be natural, maybe? Well, either way, we need 'em.
Listen up, guys! Go restore the earth!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I've got an awful feeling about this.
We should look around the colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.text:
Whatcha worried about there, guy?
We leave the rest to the bugs,
and I go look for my spirit.
Easy as pie, yeah?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Oh, right. I forgot that's the
whole reason you came here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.text:
Yeah, and it ain't listening to
a lick of what we have to say!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.text:
I don't think it's happy
about being woken up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.text:
Those frogs don't get when
they've crossed the dang line.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.text:
What do animals do when they first
wake up from hibernation there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.text:
Yep. And judging by how big this fella is,
I'm guessing it's about to horf down every
dang colony it can find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Can't say for sure,
but my gut says yep.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Actually, I think it's headed
for another colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, at least we kept
this one safe for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text: C'mon! We gotta get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
Probably gonna attack another colony.
We better get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Can't say for sure,
but my gut says yep.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text:
Looks like it wasn't headed
this way after all.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text: C'mon! We gotta get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text: Is this where your spirits are?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Should be something here,
but this feels a little...different.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So are these spirits of yours
supposed to make the ground shake?
Because that's absolutely happening!

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Looks like this worm was hiding
in that mound of earth.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sometimes you find goodies when you dig
holes. At first you might think that something's
gotten in your way, but worms often hide out
in places like that, so I personally welcome it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.text:
So we should dig and check out
whatever we find, I guess?

SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_MIDO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Considering we found one already,
I'm guessing you may just be my
lucky charm, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
So what kind of folks
are the Bashar, anyway?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Primitive and violent to the very last.
Nothing good ever comes of dealing with
them, but let's hope this ends up being
the exception that proves the rule. Anyway, there's gotta be a clue here,
so let's get to looking.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Good idea. Let's sneak inside
and keep it quiet.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
The worms are gone.
The Creator is angry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
We do not have enough offerings.
I will find an offering for the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
'The Creator'?
You folks got gods in this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
No idea—but if I had to guess, I'd say
they thought one up for themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Cripes, these folks
really are violent.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They are strong. So strong.
We cannot give them as offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I will search for an offering.
I will search elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They all said something about finding more
offerings and wandered off. Real bunch of
weirdos there, if you ask me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Offerings... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: You return. What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about this, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth is dirty now.
The earth is bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth's life is the world's life.
It is hopeless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So there's nothing we can do!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
And you folks are all
okay with this?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We pray to the Creator.
We pray every day.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, that's real good for you, but what
about everybody else? I mean, there's
gotta be some way to solve this deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There is one way.
But it will anger the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Don't care. Spill it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. The Creator hates the weak.
We must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: The heck was up with that, guy!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You are strong. The Creator likes you.
We can tell you now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Then stop with the chatter
and let's get at 'er.
What's the plan here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Wake up the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth?
Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth eats foul dirt.
The Lord of the Earth makes clean dirt.
The Lord of the Earth serves the Creator.
The Lord of the Earth made the world with the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth is asleep.
It has been sleeping long and long.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So we wake up this Lord of the Earth
and use its powers to purify the dirt?
Suppose that might work, maybe...

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Yes. But it is dangerous.
The Lord of the Earth is violent.
The Lord of the Earth listens only to the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
It is bad to wake it up
of your own will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Eh, that's nothin' to worry about.
We'll take care of it, right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Tsunanori and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So where's this Lord of the Earth sleep,
and how do we wake it up?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Remove the keystones. There are two.
This will wake the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: And where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There and there. One in each place.
They are big stones. With pictures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Sounds good. We'll be back.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: So what are these Naml folks like?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They are extremely prolific—by which
I mean there's a heck of a lot of 'em. They're not hostile, exactly, but they sure
ain't friendly either. I wouldn't be here if
I didn't have to be, so let's start looking
for clues.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Good idea. Let's sneak inside
and keep it quiet.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
The colony's food reserves are low.
We must go harvesting.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
We are going to procure
some of them right now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds? You got any idea
what they're talking about?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I found the perfect seedbeds
right here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: We cannot use them as seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Eh, they all said something about
finding seedbeds and wandered off.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: So what are these Dufda folks like?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Honestly, I don't know 'em very well—
rarely even seen 'em, in fact. All I
know is I wanna find a clue and get
out of here as quick as we can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Good idea. Let's sneak inside
and keep it quiet.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Why don't we go to the toys?
We could play with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Oooh, that could be fun.
But we need feed for the toys.
Let's go find some.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Feed? You got any idea
what they're talking about?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: These fellas creep me the heck out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They are not good for feed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Boo! Killjoys! Boo!
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Eh, they all said something about
looking for feed and wandered off.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Feed... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
I got no idea why the Bashar are rounding
up all the folks they kidnapped,
but I don't like it one bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
We've brought our offerings, O Creator!
Feast well! Feast well!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, hey. What're the Bashar
doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: We were unable to gather offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: Then you will be our offering.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Sweet cripes! All the folks they
captured turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
You saw our ceremony. This is bad.
We must kill everyone who saw.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text: Whoa! That Bashar turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
The Creator created this world.
The Creator gives us worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
But the Creator has been angry lately.
So we must give offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Offerings? Those are just a bunch of
carnivorous mushrooms, you dirtbags!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: Do not go against the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
I got no idea why the Naml are rounding
up all the folks they kidnapped,
but I don't like it one bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
You will become seedbeds.
Seedbeds for our food.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Oh, hey. What're the Naml
doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Sadly, we met with an obstacle and
were unable to secure our seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
This responsibility lies with you.
You will be our seedbed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Sweet cripes! All the folks they
captured turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
You have learned the secret to our
food supply. This cannot stand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text: Whoa! That Naml turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Securing our food. These mushrooms
create an infinite supply of seedbeds
from other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms will allow us
to live forever.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: You're sacrificing people!? What a sick joke!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
I got no idea why the Dufda are rounding
up all the folks they kidnapped,
but I don't like it one bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Hooray for all of you!
You get to be feed for our toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Oh, hey. What're the Dufda
doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Sorryyy! Stuff came up and
I couldn't bring anyone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Sweet cripes! All the folks they
captured turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
You saw our toys, didn't you?
We cannot allow this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Whoa! That Dufda turned
into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms are our toys.
Aren't they cool?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
They turn regular people into mushroom
people. Isn't that awesome?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Stop playing with lives,
you pimply tadpoles!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
That's manure and you know it!
This world is eat or be eaten!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Well, I don't think we're gonna be waltzing
into this place like it's no big deal.
You really think those Bashar are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Bashar! What do you want, you scoundrel?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: An offering! An offering!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Eh, I'll wait it out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Well, we're not gonna get
these folks to say boo.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Foiled again. They are strong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: You okay there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did not ask for your help.
You did this without permission.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Okay, let's bring things down a notch.
Tope's trying to learn where all the
worms went. Got any ideas there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Well, I don't think we're gonna be waltzing
into this place like it's no big deal.
You really think those Dufda are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
What does a Dufda want from this place?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Found feed! Found feed!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Eh, I'll wait it out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Well, we're not gonna get
these folks to say boo.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Uuugh. Fiiine.
Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: You okay there, fella?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I didn't ask for your help!
You just went ahead and gave it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Okay, let's bring things down a notch.
Tope's trying to learn where all the
worms went. Got any ideas there, guy?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I told you, I have nothing to say.
Now begone from this place.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is no cause. The clean earth has
merely become sullied over the passing
of many, many years.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That is what earth is. The coming end
of the earth's life span means the world's
end is upon us as well. This is our fate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You folks seem pretty dang calm
considering the world's about to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We Naml have prepared for this situation by
building up our food stores for a long time.
Even if there are no more worms to capture,
we will endure.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well, that's real good for you, but what
about everybody else? I mean, there's
gotta be some way to solve this deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You are sharp. You are clever. Yes, there is a way—but it comes with
great risk. So instead of engaging with
that risk, we chose a more definitive way
of extending our life span.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So you don't care if everyone else dies
as long as the Naml are all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Yet we are not the only ones doing so.
No, your words are not something
I care to hear from a selfish Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Look, bud. Just tell us how to
go fix this thing and we'll get
outta your feelers.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Hold on, Tsunanori!
I never agreed to this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
And what about your family, guy?
Don't you wanna save them?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: *grumble*

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
This is not something we can leave
to the weak. So before I tell you,
I must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The heck was up with that, guy!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well done. I suppose it is safe
to leave this in your hands.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
About dang time. Now tell us
what we gotta do already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You must wake the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
In the beginning, this world was naught but
sullied soil. But the Lord of the Earth
purified the land, creating the chance for
life to blossom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Once it was finished, it is said the
Lord of the Earth slipped into a
long slumber in a place unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So we wake up this Lord of the Earth
and use its powers to purify the dirt?
That doesn't sound so tough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Even if you manage to rouse the Lord of the Earth,
it does not mean it will purify the earth as we
hope. Indeed, it may go beyond purification and
end up destroying the entire world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Do you understand the risk that comes with
waking a being that has the power to remake
the world completely?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Eh, that's nothin' to worry about.
We'll take care of it, right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Tsunanori and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So where's this Lord of the Earth sleep,
and how do we wake it up?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I know not where it is, but legends claim the
Lord of the Earth is held in slumber by two
keystones of opposing powers. If you move
them, it might cause the Lord to awaken.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Each stone rests not far from this colony.
Look for enormous rocks carved with reliefs
of creatures unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Sounds good. We'll be back.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: You think those Bashar are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Ew! Get out of here, Bashar!
You're gross!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Bashar's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Well, they're clearly not interested
in talking to us.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Tope here's looking into why he can't
catch any more worms. You happen to
know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: You think those Naml are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Naml's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
Well, they're clearly not much
for being helpful.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Tope here's looking into why he can't
catch any more worms. You happen to
know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Nothing's causing it!
The soil is just dirty now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
It's the end of the earth's life,
which means it's the end of the world's
life—and you can't do much about that!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You folks seem pretty dang calm
considering the world's about to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We Dufda take the days as they come.
Now we'll just have fun until the end!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Well, that's real good for you, but what
about everybody else? I mean, there's
gotta be some way to solve this deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Heh! You're funny, pal! And yeah, there's a way.
I just don't care about it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Bud, I'm startin' to get
real impatient here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Fiiine, I'll tell you...
AFTER you play with me!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The heck was up with that, guy!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Wee hee hee! What fun!
So fine, I'll tell you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
About dang time. Now tell us
what we gotta do already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You have to wake up the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Some weirdo who eats the dirty earth and
makes it all clean. I heard he cleaned the
whole world once back when it was all filthy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So we wake up this Lord of the Earth
and use its powers to purify the dirt?
Seems easy enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, except I don't think he's
really gonna listen to you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
In fact, he'll probably get all mad
that you woke him and go hog wild!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Eh, that's nothin' to worry about.
We'll take care of it, right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course! Tsunanori and
me'll take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So where's this Lord of the Earth sleep,
and how do we wake it up?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Dunno! Oh, but I hear it's snoozing 'cause
of two keystones with opposing powers?
So you probably wanna try moving those.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
There's one in one place, and another in...
Ummmm... Some other place. They're big rocks
with carvings of weird creatures on 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You think those Naml are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Eh, I'll wait it out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Well, they're clearly not much
for being helpful.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You okay there, fella?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Tope here's looking into why he can't
catch any more worms. You happen to
know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You think those Dufda are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I'm gonna make you feed
for my toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Eh, I'll wait it out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Well, they're clearly not much
for being helpful.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ugh, stop bothering me!
Fiiine, I'll go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You okay there, fella?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Tope here's looking into why he can't
catch any more worms. You happen to
know anything about that, maybe?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
This is a waste of time.
Let's go, Tsunanori.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
So this is a keystone, I guess?
Let's move the sucker.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
We nudged it! Okay, guy,
let's give this everything we got!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, look at the keystone!
The relief is moving!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, that was a surprise.
What WAS that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Yeah, probably be bad if any random fella
could walk up and give the thing a shove.
I bet there's all sorts of tricks here
to stop folks from doing that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
So we have to do it again?
Ugh. Talk about annoying.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text: All right, let's move this puppy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I bet those reliefs are
gonna attack us again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
What're you muttering about, guy?
C'mon, gimme a hand here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text: Good stuff. Just a little more.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, we moved both keystones.
This should be enough to wake up
this Lord of the Earth fella.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text: Came from over there. Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your stones. So many stones.
Will you give them to me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
What, you mean these? Fella, we just
picked these up off the ground.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps they are mere stones to you,
but they are necessities to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Uh, sure? Well, go ahead and
take 'em if you're that into it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, what fine stones! Please accept
this small token of my thanks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
Sorta curious why you need
all these stones, old timer.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: You will find out soon enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text: So many... Perhaps this is enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, I'll be. He went and put all
those stones we collected into a
little pile. Sorta nice, actually.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
I have been exposed to the elements
this whole time, but now I can
finally rest in peace.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Not really following you there,
old timer.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have been a great help to me.
But now, farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W08_EVAR_MIDO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, cripes. I think that old timer
just went and built his own grave.
Rest well there, guy.
